name: Product or process innovation in companies, by company size and R&D activity: 2015–17
description: Product or process innovation in companies, by company size and R&D activity: 2015–17

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_in_house_or_external_r_d_number_yes
variableMeasured.description: In House Or External R D Number Yes

variableMeasured.name: field_in_house_or_external_r_d_number_no
variableMeasured.description: In House Or External R D Number No

variableMeasured.name: field_in_house_or_external_r_d_percent_yes
variableMeasured.description: In House Or External R D Percent Yes

variableMeasured.name: field_in_house_or_external_r_d_percent_no
variableMeasured.description: In House Or External R D Percent No

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. R&D activity is based on unedited company responses to innovation questions, not R&D expenditures. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and U.S. Census Bureau, Annual Business Survey, 2017.
